about_the_game:
Sentou Gakuen: Revival is a free-to-play passion project, created with the goal of reaching as many players as possible within this niche genre. If you’d like to support us financially, you can do so by purchasing this DLC.

Please note that this DLC is purely a donation and is by no means necessary to enjoy the full experience of our game—it does not include any new or additional content. However, as a token of our appreciation, you’ll receive:

  • Your name featured in the game’s Main Menu under Credits page (available only during Early Access).

  • 1 extra investigation slot for your journey.

  • 10 additional backpack slots to carry more items.

  • 10 extra stash spaces to store your gear.

Thank you for your generous support in helping us continue to develop Sentou Gakuen: Revival!
